lead_paragraph: Flyers forward Dan Carcillo said he was bitten in Game 2; the police used force on a fan who ran across the Phillies’ field; and the Cleveland-Boston series has Cavaliers fans perplexed.
snippet: Flyers forward Dan Carcillo said he was bitten in Game 2; the police used force on a fan who ran across the Phillies’ field; and the Cleveland-Boston series has Cavaliers fans perplexed.
